snippet: --Judge Grennen of Greenfield, Mass., accepts the Whig nomination for Lieutenant-Governor of Massachusetts. --The Legislative Committee appointed to investigate the several prisons in this State, have been engaged at the Auburn Prison for two week...
lead_paragraph: --Judge Grennen of Greenfield, Mass., accepts the Whig nomination for Lieutenant-Governor of Massachusetts. --The Legislative Committee appointed to investigate the several prisons in this State, have been engaged at the Auburn Prison for two weeks past.
